title: Frank Zappa - Buffalo (2007) 2CD (Buffalo, New York, 1980)
description:
â€œBuffaloâ€, released in 2007, was recorded on October 25, 1980 at the Buffalo Memorial Auditorium in Buffalo, New York with a band that has previously been heard on â€œTinsel Town Rebellionâ€ (1981) and â€œShut Up 'n Play Yer Guitarâ€ (1981).

At that time, Frank Zappa had assembled a particularly adept band including "stunt" guitarist Steve Vai and virtuoso drummer Vinnie Colaiuta and, freed from record company restrictions, was preparing a lot of new material for his new â€˜Barking Pumpkin Recordsâ€™ label. The concert reflects that, looking forward to the upcoming â€œTinseltown Rebellionâ€ album to be issued in May 1981.

The technical abilities of Zappa's band allowed for the rhythmic complexity and sudden shifts from one song to another in which he delighted, as the group suddenly changed from rapid-fire improvisatory playing to subtle vamping behind one of his comic monologues.
